title: Streaming Media Device Market 2015 to Grow at a CAGR of 6.02% by 2019: Market Research Store
content: Deerfield Beach, FL -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/30/2015 -- A streaming media device allows end-users to receive unencrypted subscribed channels through an addressable system, which allows them to view encrypted channels. It is used to decode transmitted signals into video content from an external signal source to display on the screen of a connected TV or a computer.
